column3:
『魔物 生まれ出でし 赤い月の夜
 古の勇者もまた 生まれ出でし姿となれ
 その身にて台座に立てば 試練は目覚める』

カッシーワから聴いた古の詩
この謎の先に勇者の試練が
待ち受けているのだろうか…
column4:
\"When the moon bleeds and the fiends
are reborn / The monks will invite you
as they have sworn.

But first you must stand on the pedestal
bare / With nothing between you and
the night air.\"

You heard this ancient song from Kass.
Perhaps a shrine waits beyond the
puzzle of these words...

column3:
『魔物 生まれ出でし 赤い月の夜
 古の勇者もまた 生まれ出でし姿となれ
 その身にて台座に立てば 試練は目覚める』

レリーフの上に裸で立ち
古代の祠を出現させた！
column4:
\"When the moon bleeds and the fiends
are reborn / The monks will invite you
as they have sworn.

But first you must stand on the pedestal
bare / With nothing between you and
the night air.\"

After you took off all your clothing and stood on
top of the pedestal on the night of the blood
moon, an the ancient shrine appeared.
